charges.charge_description: 21:841(a) &; 841(b)(1)(C) POSSESSING WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE, A SCH. II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 18 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT ON CT. 1 &; 60 MONTHS ON CT. 2, TO BE SERVED CONSECUTIVELY TO THE TERM IMPOSED IN CT. 1, FOR A TOTAL TERM OF 78 MONTHS + 3 YRS. SUPERVISED RELEASE ON CT. 1 &; 5 YRS. ON CT. 2, TO RUN CONCURRENTLY &; PAY $200 ASSESSMENT FEE TOTAL
